      Get the results of actions for a specific round.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ActionResult> History.HistoryView.getCommandFeedback(int playerNumber, int stepNumber)
      Get a map of ActionResult objects covering unit ids mapped to their commands from agents controlling the specified playerNumber that the Model attempted to execute during the specified stepNumber.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ActionResult> History.HistoryView.getPrimitiveFeedback(int playerNumber, int stepNumber)
      Get a map of ActionResult objects that correspond to the unit ids mapped to primitive Actions attempted by the Model in resolving the commands issued by the specifed playerNumber during execution of the specified stepNumber.
